text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Good morning! Fresh day from a cheerful greeting! 
Come on, everybody smile! Good morning!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Also, the team Triathlon tournament was announced the other day! 
Class president Sakura Bakushin O will also participate!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Teammate, Big, Big, Big, Recruitment! If 
you are interested, please let us know!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Good morning!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, Good morning! It's nice to be full of energy!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Bakushin O-san is also going to participate in the Triathlon. 
With that voice, she will get 4 people immediately.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Right! Alright, we should also invite someone from the class…!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ah… I'm sorry. I think it's a little… Swimming 
and cycling are not really my thing…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Eh…? Then, if it's runningー

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
I can't even do a run. Don't the two of you understand? The 
seniors will also appear in the tournament?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
We can't beat seniors who have a lot of experience 
and practice. Even if you participate, you will 
only become the tournament cannon fodder…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: ! …That's…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: You won't know until you try. Because there is no fixed result.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Surely you 2 might be able to fight well. We 
won't, but we'll support you! Good luck!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
It looks like Narita Top Road-san is over there～. Everyone, will 
you participate in the tournament called Triathlon～.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oops, we have to hurry! I want her to join my team.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
…It looks like Opera O-san wants to 
scout Top Road-san to her team.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Scout…! Th-That's amazing…!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
It means that she is capable enough to expect 
it. …Strong Seniors come out as a team…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
…I, to compete with seniors, it was completely 
out of my head… Ehehe, it slipped my mind…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kita-chan…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Top Road, you're going to be in the Triathlon, 
right? Who are you participating with? It's not a problem 
for you no matter what team you are in!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
If it's Top Road, she can aim for the championship! 
I'm looking forward to the tournament.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Umm… I haven't decided yet whether or not to participate. 
Well, for me it might be to muchー

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me. Top Road-san, got a minute? Are you hesitating about 
whether or not to participate in the Triathlon itself?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes! That's right!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, how could that happen! Can't you hear it? The cheers of the 
crowd surrounding you! A rhythm song for you who long for glory!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The stage of the commemorative event, requires your brilliance. 
Will you turn back on those expectations?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
ーBut, I know. You're not a heartless person. Therefore, I invite 
you to take my hand to the banquet!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: …… Opera O-chan, are you inviting me to join your team?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
That's right! You are worthy of a character who colors the 
overlord legend. I was fully prepared to call out to you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Overlord legend… I see.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I'm honored! Please let me join your team Opera O-chan! I 
will do my utmost best to meet everyone's expectations!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Thank you! Let's enliven the feast of the fierce hero together! 
With this, me, Top Road-san, and Doto… Only one teammate left.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ha, Eh… Ehhhhh～!? Wow, I was a team meber too～!?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I will have to refuse. …I told you already, I'm not interested.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Opera O is at your team, right? She refused 
to solicit from me, though.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Yes, so I heard. So Opera O-chan tried 
to register Ayabe-san's nameー

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
So I stopped her and I came to solicit. After all, 
it's not good to ignore Ayabe-san's will!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ーYou saved me. Geez…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Opera O must have gotten you involved. 
Even so… you're a good person.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
The opportunity was an invitation from Opera 
O-chan, but I decided of my own will!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Opera O-chan said it. They want me to participate, 
so I should be on the podiumー

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's right is what I thought! Meeting their expectations 
makes me happy. Therefore, I want to respond to those feelings.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Besides, she recognized my power and spoke to me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Even though Opera O-chan's words are so unique 
that it's a little hard to understand!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: …You really are…

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ーI understand. I will participate.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Really!? Thank you, Ayabe-san!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, I'll definitely be dragged around 
up by Opera O… This is too serious…
